entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:33 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:33 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:33 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
